subject: RE: [junit] Multiple assertions per test
msgSnippet: Any extra assertions shouldn t, in general, test things unrelated to the main assertion but it seems reasonable to me to add extra assertions that test
messageBody:
Any extra assertions shouldn't, in general, test things unrelated to the
main assertion but it seems reasonable to me to add extra assertions that
test preconditions (values not null etc), especially in cases where the main
test object has been initialised in setUp().

The original example didn't have any reasonable additional assertions IMHO
but a more complex set of tests could easily do so.

Michael Rutherfurd
